attributes.action: call an immediate General Election in light of the scandal of MPs expenses so the British public can restore their own faith in the political system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the title suggests, this is a petition calling for an immediate General Election in light of the MPs expenses scandal. The British public need to be given a chance to have their say through the ballot box in order to clean up Parliament and restore their faith in the political system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
